mapper.select: SELECT g.goods_no AS goodsNo, g.goods_title AS goodsTitle, g.goods_price AS goodsPrice, g.create_date AS createDate, c.category_no AS category, gf.goods_file_no AS goodsFileNo, gf.goods_file_ext AS goodsFileExt FROM goods g LEFT JOIN goods_category gc ON g.goods_no = gc.goods_no LEFT JOIN category c ON gc.category_no = c.category_no LEFT JOIN goods_file gf ON g.goods_no = gf.goods_no ORDER BY g.goods_no DESC LIMIT #{beginRow}, #{rowPerPage}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM goods WHERE goods_title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{search}, '%')
